author: kvbik
content:
Hello - I'd love to connect some of you with University of Chile, who are using Ethereum blockchain as a source of entropy for their randomness beacon. They are part of Drand network (https://drand.love/) and so is EF Devops team. Let me know, who do you think would be the best candidate here ;)
> Camilo Gomez (UChile)  8:03 PM
> Hello Jakub. We're from Random UChile, a randomness beacon that uses external events as randomness sources. We know that you work at Ethereum Foundation, and one of our sources is the Ethereum blockchain.
> We have a couple of questions that we want to solve. Can you help us by providing us some advice in a couple of issues that we are having? Maybe you can give us a reference of someone who can help.

author: afdudley
content: Can that person come in here and just ask their questions directly? that would probably be easiest.

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <tkstanczak> <@175364848425762817> shoot at tomasz@nethermind.io - I will be glad to help the Chilean guys, can be in Spanish :)
